LanguageData.AC.InstallStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the cortical stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty cortical stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallArchoStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the archo stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyArchoStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty archo stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.DesignatorExtractStackDesc: Extract cortical stacks from dead bodies
LanguageData.AC.MessageMustDesignateHasStack: The body should have a cortical stack
LanguageData.AC.DestroyedStackDesc: An empty stack was destroyed by inept actions of {PAWN_labelShort}.
LanguageData.AC.DestroyedWipingStackDesc: A stack was destroyed by inept actions of {PAWN_labelShort}.
LanguageData.AC.EmptyStackConfirmation: Deleting Stack:\nWARNING! You are about to wipe this stack, killing the person saved on it. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.DestroyStackConfirmation: Destroying Stack:\nWARNING! You are about to destroy this stack. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.CantWipeStackTooDumb: Rest Stack (requires intellectual skill of 5 or higher)
LanguageData.AC.FailedCorticalStackDestroyed: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Failed, cortical stack destroyed!
LanguageData.AC.ScenPart_PawnsHaveCorticalStack: {0} have a {1} chance of starting with a {2}.
LanguageData.AC.AutoLoadDesc: If active, haulers will automatically store this stack in a stack array.
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has a cortical stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasArchoStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archo stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnStackCannotDowngrade: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archo stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackNeckIsMissingOrAnot: Cannot install cortical stack - neck is missing or another implant installed in the neck.
LanguageData.AC.TakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Take empty sleeve to sleeve casket or medical bed
LanguageData.AC.CannotTakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Cannot take: No reachable, un-reserved sleeve casket or medical bed in safe temperature.
LanguageData.AC.CreateSleeveBodyDesc: Create a new baseliner or xenotype sleeve using available xenogerms.
LanguageData.AC.XenogermExplanation: Selected xenogerm will be consumed in the process. If no xenogerm is selected, the sleeve will be grown as a "Baseliner".
LanguageData.AC.GeneOptionsExplanation: Available options depend on the genes of the selected xenogerm. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.BodyOptionsExplanation: Baseliner skins and hair colour options are always available. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.ConvertGenesToGermline: Grow non-archotech genes in xenogerm as germline genes:
LanguageData.AC.PowerSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of power, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeDeteriorated: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will begin to deteriorate in {0}
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveIsDeteriorating: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve is deteriorating.
LanguageData.AC.BrainTemplateIsUsedCurrently: Brain template is active and cannot be removed or changed during sleeve growth process. Abort sleeve growth in order to remove/change brain template.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveCustomizationExplanation: When you press Accept, a sleeve will begin growing in this Sleeve incubator. During growth, it will require a constant power connection as well as neutroamine connection via neutro pipes. When the timer finishes, a Sleeve can be extracted and either used straight-away, or inserted into a Sleeve casket.
LanguageData.AC.NoHairAllowed: This race does not support hair!
LanguageData.AC.CloneSleeveDesc: Create a sleeve based on an existing pawn, including endogenes.
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutFuel: Sleeve incubator is running out neutroamine
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutPower: Sleeve incubator is running out power
LanguageData.AC.SleeveInIncubatorIsDead: Sleeve body in the incubator is dead
LanguageData.AC.RepurposeCorpseDesc: Repurpose a not fully rotten corpse and turn it into an empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CancelRepurposingCorpseDesc: Cancel repurposing corpse into a empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CorticalStackMustBeRemovedFirst: Cortical stack must be removed first.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveDesignCouldntBeFullyLoaded: Saved Sleeve Design could not be fully loaded. Missing required xenogerm!
LanguageData.AC.PawnBodyCouldntBeFullyCopied: A {PAWN_nameDef} body couldn't be copied fully. The following xenogenes were skipped: {1}
LanguageData.AC.BackedUpStacksInArray: Cortical Stack backups saved in arrays: {0}
LanguageData.AC.CannotBackupNoSuchPawn: Cannot backup {0}: there's no such pawn!
LanguageData.AC.CannotBackupPawnOnAnotherLocation: Cannot backup, {0} is on different location.
LanguageData.AC.CannotBackupNoPower: Cannot backup {0}, the building is not powered.
LanguageData.AC.EnableBackupDesc: Allow the array to automatically make backups of all installed cortical stacks belonging to the player who are on the local map.
LanguageData.AC.BackupAllStacksDesc: Make an emergency backup of all currently active cortical stacks on the local map that belong to the colony.
LanguageData.AC.CannotRestoreBackupNoOtherEmptyStacks: Restore stack from backup (no empty stacks in stockpile.)
LanguageData.AC.SuccessfullyRestoredStackFromBackup: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully restored cortical stack from backup.
LanguageData.AC.BackupsCompleted: Stack array: Backups Completed! {0} colonists were backed up!
LanguageData.AC.RestoreToStackAutomatically: Toggle if this person should be restored to a new stack automatically when the current stack is destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.EnableAutoRestoreDesc: Allow the array to automatically restore backups if a pawn with an installed cortical stacks dies.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicateStackDesc: Make a exact copy of an existing filled cortical stack that is currently stored in the stack array.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadySetToDuplicate: Already set a stack to duplicate
LanguageData.AC.NoEnoughSpaceForNewStack: Not enough space for new stack
LanguageData.AC.EjectStackTooltip: Eject this cortical stack from the array.
LanguageData.AC.EjectStackConfirmation: Do you really want to eject {0}? It will be immediately ejected onto the ground nearby.
LanguageData.AC.NoStoredStackToDuplicate: There are no stored cortical stacks in the array to duplicate.
LanguageData.AC.CancelStackDuplicationDesc: Cancel duplication of stored cortical stack.
LanguageData.AC.MessageCantSelectOffMapPawn: {1_labelShort} is off the map or not in a sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.EjectAllDesc: Drop all contained stacks onto the ground.
LanguageData.AC.SeparateGeneDesc: Select a genepack from which to separate a gene from.
LanguageData.AC.SelectGeneExplanation: The selected gene will be separated from the rest of the gene pack.
LanguageData.AC.SeparateGeneExplanation: After successful separation two genepacks will be spawned. One only with the selected gene, the other one with the rest. This process is not perfect and there is a small chance of one of the gene packs being destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.FinishedSeparatingDestroyedMessage: Gene centrifuge finished separating genepacks! {0} was destroyed during the process.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicateXenogermDesc: Select a xenogerm to duplicate. Xenogerms with archite genes require archite capsules to be loaded.
LanguageData.AC.NotEnoughArchiteCapsulesLoaded: Do you really want to duplicate the xenogerm? Not enough archite capsules are loaded to duplicate all any archite genes inside the xenogerm.
LanguageData.AC.OrganGrowingRecipesRequiresResearch: You need to research at least one organ growing recipe.
LanguageData.AC.InsertBrainTemplateDesc: Insert a brain template into the incubator.
LanguageData.AC.FactionDemandsStacks: {FACTION_name} demands stacks of their members back.\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AC.Name: Name
LanguageData.AC.HackStackDesc: Convert a stack to the players faction.
LanguageData.AC.ConvertStackDesc: Convert a stack to the players ideology.
LanguageData.AC.WipeStackDesc: Factory reset a filled cortical to be used on a new host. This process will deleted the pawn stored on it, effectively killing them.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToHackStack: This stack is set for hacking already on the decryption workbench. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToWipeStack: This stack is set for reseting already on a decryption workbench. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToRewriteStack: This stack is set for rewriting already on a decryption workbench. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.FixedAncientStack: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Fixed the ancient cortical stack!
LanguageData.AC.UnlockedNewTechnology: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Unlocked new technology - {0}!
LanguageData.AC.GainedProgressToTechnology: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Gained progress to technology - {0}!
LanguageData.AC.GainedEmptyCorticalStack: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Gained empty cortical stack!
LanguageData.AC.HackingBiocodedSuccess: Hacking biocoded equipment: Successful! {0} is unlocked.
LanguageData.AC.RewriteStackDesc: Use exploits to edit the data stored on a filled cortical stack.
LanguageData.AC.CorticalStackEditExplanation: Cortical Stacks feature advanced encryption to prevent outside forces from messing with the stored consciousness. Known exploits allow for some data to be edited and rewritten at the cost of stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.ChangingPawnIdeologyWarning: Changing a pawn ideology will also remove any roles assosiated from them.
LanguageData.AC.Tutorial: WARNING: The more you edit,the higher the stack degradation will be, causing the stored pawns personality to become more and more unstable. Stack degradation will go away over time after being installed in a body, but can take years.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackSpawningDesc: If disabled, Cortical Stacks and Archostacks will NOT spawn on any pawns. You can still craft them, get them as rewards or trade for them.
LanguageData.AC.EnableTechprintRequirement: Enable techprint requirements in research projects
LanguageData.AC.TimeToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall time needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CostToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall neutroamine cost needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackDegradationDesc: If disabled, Cortical Stacks can be edited to your heart's content without having to worry about stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.StackRewriteEditTimeValueMultiplierDe: Multiplicator of the overall stack editing time.
LanguageData.AC.StackRewriteDegradationValueMultiplie: Multiplies the overall stack degradation that is accumulated through editing.
LanguageData.AC.EnableArchostackRewritingDesc: Allows you to edit the content of Archo Stacks.
